Honors and Awards: 
 
 
1. Received prestigious VT Ingalhalikar (VTI) gold medal  at ASSICON 2017 for 
paper presentation on 
 “Reciprocal changes in sagittal alignment in Adolescent Idiopathic Scoliosis by 
strategic posterior pedicle screw fixation” 
 
 
2. Received prestigious Dr. Vyagreswarudu Gold medal at OSSAPCON 2017 for 
paper presenation on 
 
“Does Preserving or Restoring Lumbar Lordosis Influence the Final Functional Outcome 
in Lumbosacral Tuberculous Spondylodiscitis? “ 
 
 
 
3. Co-recipient of AO Spine Research grant award “A Prospective Randomised study 
comparing the effectiveness of Batroxobin , tranexamic acid and a combination in 
prevention of blood loss in lumbar spinal fusion surgery ”

PUBLICATIONS  IN  SCIENTIFIC JOURNALS: 
 
 
a) Delayed chance fracture pattern injury in a case of skeletal fluorosis

b) Prediction of posterior ligamentous complex injury in thoracolumbar fractures using

c) Thoracolumbar fractures : classification and clinical relevance : review article 
International journal of spine Sep-Dec 2016;1(2):14-21 
 
d) Enterococcus faecalis causing delayed spondylodiscitis in a case with retained 
intraspinal bullet  
 
J Spine Surg 2016;2(4):328-333  DOI: 10.21037/jss.2016.12.12 
 
 
 
d) Ochronotic Spondyloarthropathy – A Case Report  
International Journal of Science and Research (IJSR), Volume 4 Issue 2, February 
2015, 1022 - 1024  
 
e) Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumour (MPNST) of Common Peroneal Nerve –
Case Report 
International Journal of Science and Research (IJSR)Volume 4 Issue 2, February 2015, 
1174 - 1176  
 
f) Reverse Sural Fascio Cutaneous Flap for Soft Tissue Coverage around Foot and Ankle

RESEARCH  EXPERIENCE. 
 
Postgraduate research: 
 
1. “SURGICAL MANAGEMENT OF FRACTURES OF SHAFT OF HUMERUS BY 
INTERNAL FIXATION” – A comparitive study of fracture fixation by Dynamic 
Compression Plating  and Antegrade Interlocking Nailing 
 
 
 
Fellowship Research : 
 
 
1. Reciprocal changes in sagittal alignment in Adolescent Idiopathic Scoliosis by strategic 
posterior pedicle screw fixation  - Retrospective Study 
 

12 
 
2. A Prospective Randomised study comparing the effectiveness of Batroxobin , tranexamic 
acid and a combination in prevention of blood loss in lumbar spinal fusion surgery. 
 (SENT FOR PUBLICATION) 
 
3. Herpes Zoster neuritis mimicking lumbar radiculopathy in an immunocompromised 
patient – A rare Case Report 
 
 
 
4. Co Researcher in study “ Causes of risk factors in Recurrent Lumbar Disc Prolapse “. 
 
 
 
 
SPECIAL  INTERESTS: 
 
My chief areas of interest include: 
 
1. Management of polytrauma patients. 
 
2. Spine Trauma 
 
3. Spinal infections 
 
4. Spine deformity surgeries. 
 
5. Minimally Invasive Spine Surgery. 
 
6. Basic research in orthopaedics and spine. 
 
7. Innovation in orthopaedic surgery 
 
8. Orthopaedic education
